name: multifunction
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having several different uses: a multifunction device/machine/printer On the ground floor, there is a large multifunction space that can be used for exhibitions or other events. The hotel's oceanfront spa has 11 multi-function therapy rooms as well as a pool and sauna. See also
functionSynonym
multifunctional
More examplesFewer examplesThe shift from standalone analogue copiers to digital, multi-function devices has brought some security challenges. These multifunction printers are designed to produce high quality prints for home and business.The keyboard also has four multifunction keys.
